segments.advisor_message: Alright, so let's start off by talkin' about your goals. What specific objectives do you have in mind for today's session?
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, so, I really want to figure out my retirement stuff, you know, like, uh, when I can actually retire, and, um, maybe how to save more? But also, like, college for my kids, that's, uh, important too, I guess. So, like, just those two main things are kinda what I wanna discuss?
